channel.title: AlterIW
channel.description:
No more free Black Ops or MW2 for me, atleast without any cheaters. I would've played AlterIW rather than the real thing, because IW isn't doing anything against cheaters and they did. They are going to re-release alterIW for legit mw2 though, but I'm not gonna buy it or Black Ops for PC, I already bought a PS3 for the exact reason that there's no cheaters there. [quote="AlterIW.net"]Hello community,
As you've definitely heard, alterIWNet received a Cease and Desist notification from Mitchell Silberberg & Knupp LLP on behalf of Activision Publishing Inc, demanding that we stop our operations due to infringing US and International laws.
It is for this reason that we're shutting down our operation indefinitely. Please refrain from taking any actions on our behalf, such as harassing letters, posts, "denial of service" attacks, telling your grandmother or anything else that you may deem wise. There is nothing more we can do here, unless Activision recognise us as a legitimate modding community.
Thank you all for your continued dedication and contributions to alterIWNet and to PC gaming as a whole.
There are two new communities to continue what alterIWNet started:
FourDeltaOne - NTAuthority's new project which will create IW4M1 for legitimate Steam users (such who own the game) and continue development of GBH2. alterGaming - Direct continuation of the alterIWNet Community forums, directed at discussion of gaming and other topics, along with development of our own FPS game.
Sincerely, Max
Over and out[/quote]

item.title: AlterIW
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

Fucking greedy bastards. They don’t even care about the game anymore, yet they still have to ruin the fun for everyone else.

Read full topic

item.title: AlterIW
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:14, topic:437838"][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=540557.msg3958976#msg3958976 date=1333069360]

Old news. I read about it on the 13th.

Well, it’s news on mopar. I still could play alterOps yesterday and couldn’t play today so I went to check.

They officially closed on the 11, which is a shame because I heard about the website on the 6th and got excited and never got the chance to play because of my virus paranoia, so I used a laptop and it worked. So then my laptop fell off the table and the entire screen shattered so I had to find a new one and by that time when I went to go play, the game wouldn’t work.

Saphire`'s next excuse will be a variation of this…

hehe, only people that follow that thread will get that. :3

What thread?

the magic one.
[/quote]
What’s magic?[/quote]
oh oh ohhh it’s magic!!!

Read full topic
